basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Abdul Arif. Currently, I'm in my fourth year as a Business and Computer Science (double major) student at the University of Windsor. You can browse my project section to see some of the things I have created over the years. There are three reasons why I usually start working on a project. One, it seems like an interesting idea; for example, a capture the flag first person shooter created in Unity. I had a blast building different weapons and writing scripts for how the player and guns would interact wit the enviroment. Two, I am trying to learn some concepts or technology. For example, I created a Network IP Manipulator so I could learn more about how to traverse other computers over a LAN. Lastly, it something that's inherently useful. An example of this is my Windsor Traffic Data Analyzer.

projects.title: UWindsor Computer Science Wiki
projects.description: Open source project created by Computer Science students to convert the old student guide website primarily written in Ruby on Rails into a better Wiki written in React.

projects.title: Battle for the Galaxy
projects.description: A first person shooter Capture the Flag game created in Unity. Utilizes networking features to allow multiplayer functionality,

projects.title: Keystroke Dynamics Spoofer
projects.description: A program that authenticates users based on their typing patterns. And a spoofer that uses the genetic algorithm to mimic the userâ€™s typing pattern.

projects.title: Modern Deedy
projects.description: A latex resume template, that combines the layout of Jake's resume with the gloss of Deedy's resume

projects.title: Distributed Key-Value Store
projects.description: A distributed key-value store which automatically replicates data in the background while the user manages their data. Implemented a custom P2P protocol to maximize fault tolerance and scalability.

projects.title: War of Weebles
projects.description: A capture-the-flag-styled shooting game composed of AI-controlled players. The agents change their goals based on various factors, such as their health, current weapon, their personality and what they see.
